knimeNode.name: Shapefile Polygon Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads in Polygons from ESRI Shapefiles.

fullDescription.intro: Reads polygons from ESRI shapefiles. The first out port contains the polygons plus metadata. The second out port contains the geographical coordinates, which are referenced by the polygons via Row ID. The polygons may be visualized via the "Open Street Map" nodes.
fullDescription.option: Enter a valid *.shp file here. The related *.dbf, *.shx and all optional files have to be in the same folder.
Select if only the exterior ring of the polygon should be imported. That means interior rings are skipped.

ports.outPort: All imported polygons. References the geo-coordinates in the second table. May be used as input for second port of "OSM Map View" and "OSM Map To Image".
All geographical coordinates of the imported polygons. May be used as input for the first port of the "Open Street Map" nodes.
